attributes.action: Allow schools to run more school trips
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our class (10RS4) are curently studying justice as part of our GCSE RE course at Kingsbury High School in London. We belive that schools should be free to run trips and not be burdened by fear of risk and accident. It is important for our education that we can visit places and learn. Please sign our petition.
